mapper.select: SELECT ITEM_CODE , ITEM_TITLE , ITEM_DATE , ITEM_PRICE , ITEM_PLACE , ITEM_PEOPLE , CATE_CODE , LEFT(ITEM_START_DATE,10) ITEM_START_DATE , LEFT(ITEM_END_DATE,10) ITEM_END_DATE FROM ITEM_INFO

SELECT IT.ITEM_CODE ,IT.ITEM_TITLE ,IT.PEOPLE_CNT FROM item_info IT WHERE 1 = 1
AND IT.CATE_CODE = (SELECT maxCnt.CATE_CODE FROM (SELECT IT.CATE_CODE, COUNT(IT.CATE_CODE) AS cnt FROM reserve RE JOIN item_info IT ON RE.ITEM_CODE = IT.ITEM_CODE WHERE RE.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} GROUP BY IT.CATE_CODE ) AS maxCnt JOIN cate CA ON maxCnt.CATE_CODE = CA.CATE_CODE WHERE maxCnt.cnt = (SELECT MAX(cnt) FROM (SELECT COUNT(IT.CATE_CODE) AS cnt FROM reserve RE JOIN item_info IT ON RE.ITEM_CODE = IT.ITEM_CODE WHERE RE.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} GROUP BY IT.CATE_CODE ) AS max_subquery ) )
ORDER BY IT.PEOPLE_CNT DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT INFO.ITEM_CODE , ITEM_TITLE , ITEM_PLACE , PLACE_DETAIL , ITEM_DATE , ITEM_CONTENT , ITEM_PEOPLE , ITEM_PRICE , LEFT(ITEM_START_DATE,10) ITEM_START_DATE , LEFT(ITEM_END_DATE,10) ITEM_END_DATE , ATTACHED_FILE_NAME , IS_MAIN , ITEM_X , ITEM_Y , READ_CNT , CATE_CODE , MEMBER_ID FROM ITEM_INFO INFO INNER JOIN ITEM_IMAGE IMG ON INFO.ITEM_CODE=IMG.ITEM_CODE WHERE INFO.ITEM_CODE = #{itemCode}
SELECT ATTACHED_FILE_NAME FROM ITEM_IMAGE WHERE ITEM_CODE=#{itemCode}
mapper.update: UPDATE ITEM_INFO SET READ_CNT = READ_CNT+1 WHERE ITEM_CODE = #{itemCode}
